title: LAGGING SO HARD
body: I don't know what is going on with this server. I was lagging really bad and i failed my test because of your stupid lag. I was playing NA and everything was fine, just a lot of pings but it still better than this bloody server

replies.body:
>failed my test

Argh, I hate it when I fail my school tests because my video-game was lagging! Totally puts me off the mood for learning.

Anyway, what you're saying in essence is that when you play on the NA servers, your ping is pretty good, but when you play on the OCE servers, it sky-rockets?
